time_total.description: Duration of the lwcore run call

has_cache.description: Whether a lwcore cache was available

t_cache_lookup.description: Time spent on the cache lookup for a single layer

t_compute.description: Time spent on computing the outputs of a layer (includes rendering the code)

t_cache_insert.description: Time spent on the cache insertionfor a single layer

used_cache.description: Whether a cache entry was found or not.
